q_text: Would you like to be able to skip doses when escalating?
Would you like to be able to skip doses when de-escalating?
Do you want to prevent escalation of doses if the overall observed DLT rate at the current dose level is above the target DLT rate?
What is the estimate of the prior variance?
What is the minimum number of patients required at recommended dose before early stopping?
What are the prior estimates of the DLT rates at each dose? Please make this an increasing list and separate each value with a comma.
What is your prior guess of the MTD
When using the this Bayesian safety early criterion: p(true DLT rate at lowest dose > target DLT rate + x | data) > y, what would you like x to be? This is the excess toxicity above the target DLT.
What would you like y to be? This is the confidence level for safety stopping.
Would you like to be able to skip doses when deescalating?
